description:
Repost @robertfkennedyjr
• • • • •
“We are dying of hunger, not the virus” A friend sent me this from #PuertoVallarta. Predictably, people now are starving. Why is no one listening to these voices? Why are we allowing a virologist and a billionaire to dictate Global economic policies that could starve a billion people? Why are the networks censoring dissent or dismissing it as the ravings of conspiracy theorists,die hard confederates or anti-science Trumpers? Why is there no effort at risk assessment? Why are there no economists on CNN? 🔻🔻🔻
#stopbillgates #pandemic #covid19
